proposal: Diving into the world of A.L.I.C.E AI, it's impressive how you've evolved from a chatbot to a multi-industry AI powerhouse, assisting in Finance, Teaching, Health, and more. With 56 holders in the ETH network, you're clearly making waves. Imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools to further engage your community, offering them a unique way to interact with A.L.I.C.E while sharing in the success. Let's chat about how we can align our tools with your vision, creating more value for your community.
